cards.markdown:
This is rather cool. Mary Kirby who writes [Runway Girl](http://www.flightglobal.com/blogs/runway-girl/), one of Flight Global’s blogs, has decided to turn her hand to vlogging, with a news round-up on video.

<object height="295" width="480"><param name="movie" value="http://www.youtube.com/v/gcB6qFh6m2k&hl=en&fs=1"></param><param name="allowFullScreen" value="true"></param><param name="allowscriptaccess" value="always"></param><embed allowfullscreen="true" allowscriptaccess="always" height="295" src="http://www.youtube.com/v/gcB6qFh6m2k&hl=en&fs=1" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" width="480"></embed></object>

It’s a nice first effort. If I were to add constructive criticism, I’d recommend a few more pictures as well as the talking head shots, but nearly 500 views already is not bad going.

Feel free to give [Mary some feedback](http://www.flightglobal.com/blogs/runway-girl/2009/01/video-lets-get-it-started.html).
